languages.text: "Когда случилась авария, я взял на себя смелость отобрать надежных ребят и направиться на нижние палубы для обеспечения контроля и порядка. Если сидеть наверху и бездействовать, свою доблесть доказать не получится. Предпочитаю идти в огонь". {n}Офицер задирает выскобленный подбородок.{/n}

"When the disaster struck, I took the liberty of selecting a few dependable fighters and going to the lower decks to keep order. You cannot prove your valour by staying back and doing nothing. I would rather march straight into the flames." {n}Hrotko raises his clean-scraped chin.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Когда случилась авария, я взял на себя смелость отобрать надежных ребят и направиться на нижние палубы для обеспечения контроля и порядка. Если сидеть наверху и бездействовать, свою доблесть доказать не получится. Предпочитаю идти в огонь". {n}Офицер задирает выскобленный подбородок.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "When the disaster struck, I took the liberty of picking out a few dependable men and going to the lower decks to keep order. You can't prove your valour if you stay up there and do nothing. I would rather go into the flames." {n}The officer scuffs his scraped chin.{/n}

"When the disaster struck, I took the liberty of picking out a few dependable men and going to the lower decks to keep order. You can't prove your valour if you stay up there and do nothing. I would rather go into the flames." {n}The officer scuffs his scraped chin.{/n}

"When the disaster struck, I took the liberty of selecting a few dependable men and going to the lower decks to keep order. You cannot prove your valour by staying back and doing nothing. I would rather march straight into the flames." {n}The officer scuffs his scraped chin.{/n}

"When the disaster struck, I took the liberty of selecting a few dependable men and going to the lower decks to keep order. You cannot prove your valour by staying back and doing nothing. I would rather march straight into the flames." {n}The officer scuffs his scraped chin.{/n}

"When the disaster struck, I took the liberty of selecting a few dependable fighters and going to the lower decks to keep order. You cannot prove your valour by staying back and doing nothing. I would rather march straight into the flames." {n}Hrotko raises his clean-scraped chin.{/n}

"When the disaster struck, I took the liberty of selecting a few dependable fighters and going to the lower decks to keep order. You cannot prove your valour by staying back and doing nothing. I would rather march straight into the flames." {n}Hrotko raises his clean-scraped chin.{/n}

languages.text: «Cuando nos azotó el desastre, me tomé la libertad de seleccionar a un pequeño grupo de guerreros de confianza para poner orden en las cubiertas inferiores. Uno no demuestra su valor quedándose atrás sin hacer nada. Prefiero marchar contra las llamas». {n}Hrotko alza su barbilla raspada.{/n}
languages.original_text: "When the disaster struck, I took the liberty of selecting a few dependable fighters and going to the lower decks to keep order. You cannot prove your valour by staying back and doing nothing. I would rather march straight into the flames." {n}Hrotko raises his clean-scraped chin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Cuando nos azotó el desastre, me tomé la libertad de seleccionar a un pequeño grupo de guerreros de confianza para poner orden en las cubiertas inferiores. Uno no demuestra su valor quedándose atrás sin hacer nada. Prefiero marchar contra las llamas». {n}Hrotko alza su barbilla raspada.{/n}

languages.text: 「災害が起こったとき、私は自ら数名の頼もしい戦士を選んで、下層デッキに赴き秩序を守りました。後ろにいて何もしないのでは、勇気の証明にはなりません。むしろ炎の中に突っ込みたいのです」{n}フロトコは、きれいに剃った顎をくいっと上げる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "When the disaster struck, I took the liberty of selecting a few dependable fighters and going to the lower decks to keep order. You cannot prove your valour by staying back and doing nothing. I would rather march straight into the flames." {n}Hrotko raises his clean-scraped chin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「災害が起こったとき、私は自ら数名の頼もしい戦士を選んで、下層デッキに赴き秩序を守りました。後ろにいて何もしないのでは、勇気の証明にはなりません。むしろ炎の中に突っ込みたいのです」{n}フロトコは、きれいに剃った顎をくいっと上げる。{/n}

languages.text: “灾难发生的时候，我自作主张地挑选了几位可靠的战斗人员，前往底层甲板维持秩序。如果什么事情都不做，那还怎么证明自己？我宁愿踏入烈焰之中。”{n}赫洛卡扬起了刮得干干净净的下巴。{/n}
languages.original_text: "When the disaster struck, I took the liberty of selecting a few dependable fighters and going to the lower decks to keep order. You cannot prove your valour by staying back and doing nothing. I would rather march straight into the flames." {n}Hrotko raises his clean-scraped chin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “灾难发生的时候，我自作主张地挑选了几位可靠的战斗人员，前往底层甲板维持秩序。如果什么事情都不做，那还怎么证明自己？我宁愿踏入烈焰之中。”{n}赫洛卡扬起了刮得干干净净的下巴。{/n}

languages.text: "Als die Katastrophe ausbrach, war ich so frei, einige verlässliche Kämpfer auszuwählen und auf die Unterdecks zu gehen, um die Ordnung zu wahren. Man kann seinen Mut nicht beweisen, indem man sich zurückhält und nichts tut. Ich würde lieber geradewegs in die Flammen marschieren." {n}Hrotko reckt sein glattrasiertes Kinn.{/n}
languages.original_text: "When the disaster struck, I took the liberty of selecting a few dependable fighters and going to the lower decks to keep order. You cannot prove your valour by staying back and doing nothing. I would rather march straight into the flames." {n}Hrotko raises his clean-scraped chin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Als die Katastrophe ausbrach, war ich so frei, einige verlässliche Kämpfer auszuwählen und auf die Unterdecks zu gehen, um die Ordnung zu wahren. Man kann seinen Mut nicht beweisen, indem man sich zurückhält und nichts tut. Ich würde lieber geradewegs in die Flammen marschieren." {n}Hrotko reckt sein glattrasiertes Kinn.{/n}

languages.text: « Quand le désastre a frappé, j'ai pris la liberté de sélectionner plusieurs combattants chevronnés pour rétablir l'ordre sur les ponts inférieurs. Après tout, nul n'a jamais pu prouver sa valeur en restant en retrait à attendre que les choses se passent. Je préférerais autant avancer tout droit dans les flammes. » {n}Hrotko lève son menton rasé de près.{/n}
languages.original_text: "When the disaster struck, I took the liberty of selecting a few dependable fighters and going to the lower decks to keep order. You cannot prove your valour by staying back and doing nothing. I would rather march straight into the flames." {n}Hrotko raises his clean-scraped chin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Quand le désastre a frappé, j'ai pris la liberté de sélectionner plusieurs combattants chevronnés pour rétablir l'ordre sur les ponts inférieurs. Après tout, nul n'a jamais pu prouver sa valeur en restant en retrait à attendre que les choses se passent. Je préférerais autant avancer tout droit dans les flammes. » {n}Hrotko lève son menton rasé de près.{/n}
